summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The MPEG1VIDEOINFO structure describes an MPEG-1 video stream.

member.name: MPEG1VIDEOINFO.dwStartTimeCode
member.summary: 25-bit group-of-pictures (GOP) time code at start of data.

member.name: MPEG1VIDEOINFO.cbSequenceHeader
member.summary: Length of the bSequenceHeader member, in bytes.

member.name: MPEG1VIDEOINFO.bSequenceHeader
member.summary: Start of an array that contains the sequence header, including quantization matrices, if any. The size of the array is given in the cbSequenceHeader member.
